footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Anemo Traveler | Update Date: 09/28/2022 | Editor: Samantha#9907

fields.name: Replacement Weapon:
fields.value: Festering Desire, Sacrificial Sword, Freedom-Sworn, Xiphos's Moonlight, Skyrider Sword, Iron Sting, Sapwood Blade

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> Energy Recharge |<goblet>  Anemo DMG Bonus |<circlet>  CRIT Rate or CRIT DMG

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Burst: Gust Surge
**2)** Elemntal Skill: Palm Vortex
**3)** Normal Attack: Foreign Ironwind

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: Unless the Traveler has a large amount of Energy Recharge, building Elemental Mastery and 4-piece Viridescent Venerer is recommended.
